00065     enum GRAPH_FLAG  {
00066       CHIRAL_RIGHT  = 0x10000000,
00067       CHIRAL_LEFT   = 0x20000000,
00068       ATOM_LEAVING  = 0x40000000,
00069       HYDROGEN_BOND = 0x0F000000,
00070       SYMREL_MASK   = 0x00FF0000,
00071       CHIRAL_MASK   = 0xCFFFFFFF,
00072       TYPE_MASK     = 0x00FFFFFF
00073     };

00079 
00080       public:

00082         Vertex ();

00088         ~Vertex();
00089

00094         void  SetTypeExt ( int typeExt );

00102         void  AddBond     ();

00104         inline void  SetUserID   ( int vid ) { user_id = vid; }
00105         inline int   GetProperty () { return property; }
00106         inline int   GetID       () { return id;       }
00107         inline int   GetUserID   () { return user_id;  }
00108         inline cpstr GetName     () { return name;     }
00109         inline int   GetType     () { return type;     }
00110         inline int   GetTypeExt  () { return type_ext; }
00111         int   GetNBonds   ();
00112 
00113         void  SaveType    ();  // in userid
00114         void  RestoreType ();  // from userid
00115         void  CopyType    ( PVertex V );
00116 
00117         virtual void Print ( int PKey );
00118 
00119         virtual void Copy ( PVertex V );
00120 
00121         void  read  ( io::RFile f );
00122         void  write ( io::RFile f );
00123 
00124         void  mem_read  ( cpstr S, int & l );
00125         void  mem_write ( pstr S, int & l );
00126 
00127       protected:
00128         pstr name;     // name may be general, "C", "Hg", "Cl" etc.
00129         int  type;     // type of vertex, see comments in
00130                        // mmdb_math_graph.cpp
00131         int  type_ext; // vertex type extention
00132         int  property; // flagwise properties -- user-defined
00133         int  id;       // a graph-defined vertex id
00134         int  user_id;  // a user-defined vertex id
00135 
00136         void InitVertex();
00137 
00138     };

00207     enum GRAPH_RC  {
00208       MKGRAPH_Ok            =  0,
00209       MKGRAPH_NoAtoms       = -1,
00210       MKGRAPH_ChangedAltLoc =  1,
00211       MKGRAPH_MaxOccupancy  =  2
00212     };

00214     DefineClass(Graph);
00215 
00216     class Graph : public io::Stream  {
00217 
00218       friend class GraphMatch;
00219       friend class CSBase0;
00220 
00221       public :
00222 
00223         Graph ();
00224         Graph ( PResidue R, cpstr altLoc=NULL );
00225         Graph ( io::RPStream Object );
00226         ~Graph();
00227 
00228         void  Reset   ();
00229         void  SetName ( cpstr gname );
00230         inline pstr GetName() { return name; }
00231 
00232         //   AddVertex(..) and AddEdge(..) do not copy the objects, but
00233         // take them over. This means that application should forget
00234         // about pointers to V and G once they were given to Graph.
00235         // Vertices and edges  must be allocated newly prior each call
00236         // to AddVertex(..) and AddEdge(..).
00237         void  AddVertex   ( PVertex  V );
00238         void  AddEdge     ( PEdge    G );
00239         void  SetVertices ( PPVertex V, int vlen );
00240         void  SetEdges    ( PPEdge   G, int glen );
00241 
00242         void  RemoveChirality();
00243         void  LeaveChirality ( int eltype );
00244 
00245         //   MakeGraph(..) makes a graph corresponding to residue R.
00246         // The graphs vertices then correspond to the residue's atoms
00247         // (Vertex::userid points to atom R->atom[Vertex::userid]),
00248         // edges are calculated as chemical bonds between atoms basing
00249         // on the table of cut-off distances.
00250         //   altCode specifies a particular conformation that should be
00251         // used for making the graph. If it is set to "" or NULL ("empty"
00252         // altcode) but the residue does not have conformation which
00253         // contains *only* ""-altcode atoms, a conformation corresponding
00254         // to maximal occupancy will be used. The same will happen if
00255         // altcode information in residue is not correct, whatever altCode
00256         // is specified.
00257         //   After making the graph, Build(..) should be called as usual
00258         // before graph matching.
00259         //   Non-negative return means that graph has been made.
00260         // MakeGraph(..) may return:
00261         //   MKGRAPH_Ok             everything is Ok
00262         //   MKGRAPH_NoAtoms        residue does not have atoms, graph
00263         //                          is not made
00264         //   MKGRAPH_ChangedAltLoc  a different altcode was used because
00265         //                          the residue has only one altcode and
00266         //                          that is different of
00267         //   MKGRAPH_MaxOccupancy   a maximal-occupancy conformation has
00268         //                          been chosen because of default
00269         //                          ""-altcode supplied or incorrect
00270         //                          altcode information in the residue
00271         int   MakeGraph   ( PResidue R, cpstr altLoc=NULL );
00272 
00273         int   MakeGraph   ( PPAtom atom, int nAtoms );
00274 
00275         void  HideType    ( int bond_vx_type );
00276         void  ExcludeType ( int type );
00277 
00278         void  MakeSymmetryRelief ( bool noCO2 );
00279         void  IdentifyRings      ();
00280         int   IdentifyConnectedComponents();  // returns their number >= 1
00281 
00282         int   Build       ( bool bondOrder );  // returns 0 if Ok
00283 
00284         void  MakeVertexIDs      ();  // simply numbers vertices as 1.. on
00285         int   GetVertexID        ( int vertexNo );
00286         int   GetVertexNo        ( cpstr vname  );
00287         // GetBondedVertexID(..) works after MoveType(..)
00288         int   GetNBondedVertices ( int vertexNo );
00289         int   GetBondedVertexID  ( int vertexNo, int bond_vx_type,
00290                                    int bondNo );
00291 
00292         PVertex   GetVertex ( int vertexNo );  // 1<=vertexNo<=nVertices
00293         inline int GetNofVertices() { return nVertices; }
00294 
00295         PEdge    GetEdge    ( int edgeNo );    // 1<=edgeNo<=nEdges
00296         inline int GetNofEdges() { return nEdges;    }
00297 
00298         void  GetVertices ( PPVertex & V, int & nV );
00299         void  GetEdges    ( PPEdge   & E, int & nE );
00300 
00301         virtual void Print();
00302         void  Print1();
00303 
00304         virtual void Copy ( PGraph G );
00305 
00306         void  read  ( io::RFile f );
00307         void  write ( io::RFile f );
00308 
00309         void  mem_read  ( cpstr S, int & l );
00310         void  mem_write ( pstr S, int & l );
00311 
00312       protected :
00313         pstr     name;
00314         int      nVertices,nEdges, nAllVertices,nAllEdges;
00315         PPVertex vertex;
00316         PPEdge   edge;
00317         imatrix  graph;
00318 
00319         void  InitGraph ();
00320         void  FreeMemory();
00321 
00322         void  markConnected ( int vno, int cno );
00323 
00324       private :
00325         int  nVAlloc,nEAlloc,nGAlloc;
00326 
00327     };
00328

00350 
00351         bool isMatch       ( ivector FV1, ivector FV2, int nv );
00352         bool isCombination ( ivector FV1, ivector FV2, int nv );
00353 
00354         // do not allocate or dispose FV1 and FV2 in application!
00355         void GetMatch ( ivector & FV1, ivector & FV2, int & nv,
00356                         realtype & p1, realtype & p2 );
00357

00380     enum GRAPH_MATCH_FLAG  {
00381       GMF_UniqueMatch    = 0x00000001,
00382       GMF_NoCombinations = 0x00000002
00383     };

00385     enum VERTEX_EXT_TYPE  {
00386       EXTTYPE_Ignore   = 0,
00387       EXTTYPE_Equal    = 1,
00388       EXTTYPE_AND      = 2,
00389       EXTTYPE_OR       = 3,
00390       EXTTYPE_XOR      = 4,
00391       EXTTYPE_NotEqual = 5,
00392       EXTTYPE_NotAND   = 6,
00393       EXTTYPE_NotOR    = 7
00394     };

00396     DefineClass(GraphMatch);
00397 
00398     class GraphMatch : public io::Stream  {
00399 
00400       public :
00401 
00402         GraphMatch ();
00403         GraphMatch ( io::RPStream Object );
00404         ~GraphMatch();
00405 
00406         void SetFlag          ( word flag );
00407         void RemoveFlag       ( word flag );
00408         void SetMaxNofMatches ( int maxNofMatches, bool stopOnMaxN );
00409         void SetTimeLimit     ( int maxTimeToRun=0 );
00410         inline bool GetStopSignal() { return Stop; }
00411 
00412         void Reset();
00413 
00414         //  MatchGraphs looks for maximal common subgraphs of size
00415         //  not less than minMatch. The number of found subgraphs
00416         //  is returned by GetNofMatches(), the subgraph vertices
00417         //  are returned by GetMatch(..). Control parameters:
00418         //      vertexType   true if vertex type should be taken
00419         //                   into account and False otherwise
00420         //      vertexExt    key to use extended vertex types (defined
00421         //                   as type_ext in Vertex).
00422         void MatchGraphs    ( PGraph Gh1, PGraph Gh2, int minMatch,
00423                               bool vertexType=true,
00424                               VERTEX_EXT_TYPE vertexExt=EXTTYPE_Ignore );
00425         void PrintMatches   ();
00426         inline int GetNofMatches  () { return nMatches; }
00427         inline int GetMaxMatchSize() { return maxMatch; }
00428 
00429         // do not allocate or dispose FV1 and FV2 in application!
00430         // FV1/p1 will always correspond to Gh1, and FV2/p2 -
00431         // to Gh2 as specified in MatchGraphs(..)
00432         void GetMatch ( int MatchNo, ivector & FV1, ivector & FV2,
00433                         int & nv, realtype & p1, realtype & p2 );
00434 
00435         void read  ( io::RFile f );
00436         void write ( io::RFile f );
00437 
00438         void mem_read  ( cpstr S, int & l );
00439         void mem_write ( pstr  S, int & l );
00440 
00441       protected :
00442         PGraph   G1,G2;
00443         PPVertex V1;
00444         PPVertex V2;
00445         imatrix  c1,c2;
00446         bool     swap;
00447     #ifndef _UseRecursion
00448         ivector  jj;
00449     #endif
00450         int      n,m;
00451 
00452         imatrix3 P;
00453         imatrix  iF1;
00454         ivector  F1,F2,ix;
00455 
00456         int      nMatches,maxNMatches;
00457         PPGMatch Match;
00458         bool     wasFullMatch,Stop,stopOnMaxNMathches;
00459         word     flags;
00460         int      maxMatch,timeLimit;
00461 
00462         void  InitGraphMatch();
00463         void  FreeMemory    ();
00464         void  FreeRecHeap   ();
00465         void  GetMemory     ();
00466         void  GetRecHeap    ();
00467         int   Initialize    ( bool vertexType, int vertexExt );
00468     #ifdef _UseRecursion
00469         void  Backtrack     ( int i );          // exact matching
00470     #else
00471         void  Ullman        ();
00472     #endif
00473         void  Backtrack1    ( int i, int k0 );  // exact/partial matching
00474         void  CollectMatch  ( int nm );
00475 
00476       private :
00477         int     nAlloc,mAlloc,nMAlloc;
00478         time_t  startTime;
00479 
00480     };
